January 2011 10:01 AM I do love the pious attitude of the left on this subject, I remember a time when they were only to happy to jump into bed with Rupert Murdoch and the Sun! When Andy Coulson was editor of the NoW the paper purported to show George Osborne in a girls-and-cocaine situation, or so I have heard. Although this story was easily refuted, you would expect the future chancellor to be pretty miffed about it. And yet it is said that George Osborne himself suggested Andy Coulson as the Govt's director of communications. Amazing kind-heartedness on the part of a man not generally known for such qualities. the White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. .( AP Photo/Eugene Tanner) The Associated Press NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
